page.title: 06Entertainment
page.content: We talked to some people in our area about the local{ENTERTAINMENT.}They had nothing apart from the local clubs. Entertainment is available only if people travel for about half an hour to the four main towns. {SHREWSBURY:}There is a cinema and swimming baths.There are lots of annual events like the Agricultural show and the flower show.There is also the Shrewbury Town Football Club. {MUCH WENLOCK:}Here there are concerts, choirs and sometimes plays held in the Abbey. The secondary School has a sports centre. { {BRIDGNORTH:} There are good sports facilities and a cinema.{ {TELFORD:}There is a new ice rink and several sports centres. There is also Telfords football ground.
